jasima.core.simulation

接口 SimComponent

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Notifier<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>, ValueStore
    所有已知子接口:
    SimComponentContainer<SUB>
    所有已知实现类:
    DynamicJobSource, JobSource, JSExample, Shop, SimComponentBase, SimComponentContainerBase, StaticJobSource, WorkStation

    public interface SimComponent
extends Notifier<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>, ValueStore, java.lang.Cloneable
    This interface provides basic functionality for simulation components.
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt
    另请参阅:
    Simulation

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  SimComponent.ProduceResultsMessage
      Message send when a SimComponent is requested to produce results.
      static class  SimComponent.SimComponentLifeCycleMessage
      Base class for messages send by a SimComponent to registered listeners.

      default void done() 
      java.lang.String getHierarchicalName()
      Returns a base name for a SimConponent consisting of the hierarchical representation of the parent (getParent()) if it exists and the (simple) name of the component's class.

      Gets the name of this component (must not be changed once set).

      • schedule

        default void schedule(double time,
                      int prio,
                      java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method at certain point in time.
        参数:
        time - The time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time.
        method - The method to call at the given moment.
        另请参阅:
        Simulation.schedule(double, int, Runnable)

      • schedule

        default void schedule(java.lang.String description,
                      double time,
                      int prio,
                      java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method at certain point in time.
        参数:
        description - Some description that is added as an additional parameter to the Event object (makes debugging easier).
        time - The time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time.
        method - The method to call at the given moment.
        另请参阅:
        Simulation.schedule(double, int, Runnable)

      • scheduleIn

        default void scheduleIn(double time,
                        int prio,
                        java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method in a certain amount of time. In contrast to schedule(double, int, Runnable) this method expects a relative time instead of an absolute one.
        参数:
        time - The time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).
        method - The method to call at the given moment.

      • scheduleIn

        default void scheduleIn(java.lang.String description,
                        double time,
                        int prio,
                        java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method in a certain amount of time. In contrast to schedule(double, int, Runnable) this method expects a relative time instead of an absolute one.
        参数:
        description - Some description that is added as an additional parameter to the Event object (makes debugging easier).
        time - The time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).
        method - The method to call at the given moment.

      • scheduleIn

        default void scheduleIn(java.time.Duration duration,
                        int prio,
                        java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method in a certain amount of time. In contrast to schedule(double, int, Runnable) this method expects a relative time specified by a Duration instead of an absolute one.

        Usually using scheduleIn(String, Duration, int, Runnable) should be preferred.

        参数:
        duration - The duration from the current simulation time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).
        method - The method to call at the given moment.

      • scheduleIn

        default void scheduleIn(java.lang.String description,
                        java.time.Duration duration,
                        int prio,
                        java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method in a certain amount of time. In contrast to schedule(double, int, Runnable) this method expects a relative time specified by a Duration instead of an absolute one.
        参数:
        description - Some description that is added as an additional parameter to the Event object (makes debugging easier).
        duration - The duration from the current simulation time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).
        method - The method to call at the given moment.

      • schedulePeriodically

        default void schedulePeriodically(double firstInvocation,
                                  double interval,
                                  int prio,
                                  java.util.function.BooleanSupplier method)
        Periodically calls a certain method. While this method returns true, a next invocation after the given time interval is scheduled.
        另请参阅:
        Simulation.schedulePeriodically(double, double, int, BooleanSupplier)

      • schedulePeriodically

        default void schedulePeriodically(double firstInvocation,
                                  double interval,
                                  int prio,
                                  java.lang.Runnable method)
        Periodically calls a certain method until the simulation terminates.
        另请参阅:
        Simulation.schedulePeriodically(double, double, int, Runnable)

      • scheduleProcess

        default void scheduleProcess(int prio,
                             java.util.function.DoubleSupplier method)
        Calls a certain method at the times returned by the method itself. The first invocation is performed at the current time (asynchronously, i.e., scheduleProcess() returns before method is called for the first time). Subsequent calls are scheduled at the absolute times returned by the previous method invocation. No more invocations are scheduled if method returned NaN or a negative value.
        另请参阅:
        Simulation.scheduleProcess(int, DoubleSupplier)

      • trace

        default void trace(java.lang.Object... params)
        Produces a trace message.
        另请参阅:
        Simulation.trace(Object...)

      • isTraceEnabled

        default boolean isTraceEnabled()
        Returns true is trace messages should be produced.
        另请参阅:
        Simulation.isTraceEnabled()

      • initRndGen

        default DblStream initRndGen(DblStream s,
                             java.lang.String streamName)
        Initializes the random number generator associated with the DblStream s. This just delegates to the RandomFactory of a simulation.
        另请参阅:
        Simulation.initRndGen(DblStream, String)

      • initRndGen

        default IntStream initRndGen(IntStream s,
                             java.lang.String streamName)
        Initializes the random number generator associated with the IntStream s. This just delegates to the RandomFactory of a simulation.
        另请参阅:
        Simulation.initRndGen(IntStream, String)

      • initRndGen

        default java.util.Random initRndGen(java.lang.String streamName)
        Creates an instance of Java's Random class initialized with a seed derived from the parameter streamName. This just delegates to the method RandomFactory.createInstance(String) of a simulation.
        另请参阅:
        Simulation.initRndGen(String)

      • getHierarchicalName

        java.lang.String getHierarchicalName()
        Returns a base name for a SimConponent consisting of the hierarchical representation of the parent (getParent()) if it exists and the (simple) name of the component's class.

      • notifierImpl

        Notifier<SimComponent,java.lang.Object> notifierImpl()
        SimComponents can notify registered listeners of certain events/messages occurring. The default implementation of SimComponent informs listeners of lifecycle events such as INIT, DONE, etc.
        指定者:
        notifierImpl 在接口中 Notifier<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>

      • valueStoreImpl

        ValueStore valueStoreImpl()
        SimComponents provide a ValueStore to attach arbitrary key/value-pairs with them. This can be used as a simple extension mechanism without having to use inheritance.
        指定者:
        valueStoreImpl 在接口中 ValueStore

      • clone

        SimComponent clone()
        Public clone method. Implementing classes should implement a suitable functionality or throw a CloneNotSupportedException wrapped in a RuntimeException.
